import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MyserviceService } from '../myservice.service'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'], }) export class CartComponent { constructor( private service: MyserviceService, private _formBuilder: FormBuilder ) {} dishes: any[] = []; ngOnInit() { const dishesData = localStorage.getItem('Dishes'); if (dishesData !== null) { this.dishes = JSON.parse(dishesData); console.log(this.dishes); } } isLinear = true; }
